post.description: Creates a new task and places it at the end of the processing queue

parameters.name: images
parameters.description: Images to process, plus an optional GPC file. If included, the GPC file should have .txt extension

parameters.name: zipurl
parameters.description: URL of the zip file containing the images to process, plus an optional GPC file. If included, the GPC file should have .txt extension

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: An optional name to be associated with the task

parameters.name: options
parameters.description: Serialized JSON string of the options to use for processing, as an array of the format: [{name: option1, value: value1}, {name: option2, value: value2}, ...]. For example, [{"name":"cmvs-maxImages","value":"500"},{"name":"time","value":true}]. For a list of all options, call /options

uuid.description: UUID of the newly created task

get.description: Gets information about this task, such as name, creation date, processing time, status, command line options and number of images being processed. See schema definition for a full list.

processingTime.description: Milliseconds that have elapsed since the task started being processed.

status.description: Status code (10 = QUEUED, 20 = RUNNING, 30 = FAILED, 40 = COMPLETED, 50 = CANCELED)

options.description: List of options used to process this task

get.description: Retrieves the console output of the OpenDroneMap's process. Useful for monitoring execution and to provide updates to the user.

parameters.name: line
parameters.description: Optional line number that the console output should be truncated from. For example, passing a value of 100 will retrieve the console output starting from line 100. Defaults to 0 (retrieve all console output).

get.description: Retrieves an asset (the output of OpenDroneMap's processing) associated with a task

parameters.name: asset
parameters.description: Type of asset to download. Use "all.zip" for zip file containing all assets.

post.description: Cancels a task (stops its execution, or prevents it from being executed)
Removes a task and deletes all of its assets
Restarts a task that was previously canceled or that had failed to process

get.description: Retrieves the command line options that can be passed to process a task

name.description: Command line option (exactly as it is passed to the OpenDroneMap process, minus the leading '--')

type.description: Datatype of the value of this option

domain.description: Valid range of values (for example, "positive integer" or "float > 0.0")

help.description: Description of what this option does

taskQueueCount.description: Number of tasks currently being processed or waiting to be processed

success.description: true if the command succeeded, false otherwise

error.description: Error message if an error occured
